channel.title: Can't fill unused colored portions of deathnote with Black
channel.description: At the moment you can't fill unused parts of the deathnote with Black. I have to get around it by first filling it with any other color, and THEN filling it with black.

item.title: Can't fill unused colored portions of deathnote with Black
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
I was writing the same bug report

What happened?

The Fill-tool did not fill a blank area with black.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The blank area on the DN would have been black.

Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Use black ink
  2. Use fill tool
  3. Watch as you never get the ink on it, and even manage to confuse the system if you spam.

Comments:

You can avoid the bug by using the fill tool to first with another color, then Black.
